channel.title: +1 Forward - Firebrands Series - A Complicated Profession
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-firebrands-a-complicated-profession
Rach and Rich continue their third Summer Series. This series covers games in the Firebrands style of PbtA games. This third episode of the series features Jason Price of AlwaysCheckers, creator of *​A Complicated Profession* .
Timecodes: 00:02:31 - Setting Up 00:07:06 - The Challenge 00:20:20 - Playing the Game
BOTH A Complicated Profession *and* the +1 Forward podcast are nominated for ENnie awards. Public voting for the winners of our respective categories (and many others) is live at the time of this episode's publication and ends July 24th. Please go vote for us! https://vote.ennie-awards.com/vote/2022/
Find Jason's games here: https://alwayscheckers.itch.io/
